title: Sartini-Stats
text: Joe Sartini is currently a 4th year biostatistics PhD student, with broad interests in deriving clinically relevant features from high-dimensional data. His methodological works focuses on comprehensive modeling of uncertainty, better incorporation of hierarchical structure, and implementation of practical software.
